title: pEsAdE pOngaLaDi en piLLai
sahitya:
pEsAdE pOngaLaDi en piLLai vandu ungaL vITTil kaLLamiTTAn 
enru sholli pEshuginrIr kaiyai kaiyai vIshuginrIr vElaiyillai


anupallavi

  kAshAmbu mEniyuLLa kaTTazhagan en piLLai kAlayilirundu ennaik-kaNamum aghalavillai vAcAma 
gOcaramAi vandu shonnIr inda shollai ungaL vambukkum tumbukkum endan maghan tAnO vELaiyillai


caraNam 1    ivaLAnAl migha nANam koNDavaL nETru inda maharAjan vITTai sonda vIDu enru eNNi ingum angum alaindu tirindavaL uvamaiyODu uLarik-koTTi muttamiTTAnenru sholli Urariya muzhakki viTTu nANamAgudenravar
    caraNam 2    kaiyu-meyyumAi piDittu vandEnenru sholli kaNakkAghap-pEshinALE ivaLoru kaLLi meyyAghak-
kATTaDi enrAl vizhiyum paraparattu tan miraLum piLLaiyai kATTi vizhikkirALE palli
    caraNam 3    Urk-kuzhandai azhudAlO kNNan kiLLi viTTAn Uri onru vizhundAlO kaNNan taLLi viTTAn 
kAr veNNaik-kANOmenrAl kaNNan koLLaiyiTTAn ungaL karpanai sheyyum poyyukku kaNNanO aghappaTTAn
